definition: free from fear or doubt, make certain of
details:
adjective
- free from fear or doubt
= synonyms: untroubled
- free from danger or risk
= example: free from danger or risk
- not likely to fail or give way
= example: not likely to fail or give way
- financially sound
= synonyms: safe
- immune to attack
= synonyms: inviolable
verb
- make certain of
= synonyms: guarantee, insure, ensure
- furnish with battens
= synonyms: batten, batten down
- cause to be firmly attached
= synonyms: fix
- fill or close tightly with or as if with a plug
= synonyms: plug, stop up
- get by special effort
= synonyms: procure
- assure payment of
